name: 梅根·麦考密克
name_full: 梅根·麦考密克 Megan McCormick
introduction: McCormick was born in Glendale, Ohio, and raised in Florida. She graduated from Boston University with a B.S. degree in Philosophy and Political Science, has been a presenter on Globe Trekker since 1998, and has hosted episodes on countries like Greece, Ghana, Indonesia, Sri Lanka, China, India and Egypt. She has also presented Treks in a Wild World, a show which places more emphasis on ecotourism and history combined with adventure elements. Before joining Pilot Productions, McCormick taught English in Japan and worked behind the scenes on The News with Brian Williams on the CNBC and MSNBC cable networks.
